text:
Question 165) A tap is dripping water in a bucket with a capacity of 18 liters. At the current moment, the bucket is occupied by 50% of its capacity. Every second 5 drops of tap water fall, and a drop is formed on average by 5 × 10−2 ml of water.
How long, in time, will it take to completely fill the bucket, starting from the current moment?
A) 2 × 101
B) 1 × 101
C) 2 × 10−2
D) 1 × 10−2
E) 1 × 10−3
